body.p: United States District Court. Western Division of Washington. Northern Division ???
In the Matter of Application of K. Gregory, at al. for a WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS.
No. 2646 APPEAL BOND

KNOW ALL MEN BY THESE PRESENTS, That I M. Aloshin as Principal, and Mike Rubestein, residing at 1223 Yesler Way in the City of Seattle, State of Washington, and Ida Rubenstein residing at 1223 Yesler Way in the City of Seattle, State of Washington, as sureties, are held and firmly bound unto the the United States of America in the full sum of Two Hundred and Fifty Dollars ($250.00) to be paid to the United States, for which payment well and truly made, we, and each of us, do bind ourselves, our heirs, executors and administrators, jointly and severally, firmly by these presents.
Sealed with our Seals this 24 day of March A.D. 1914
WHEREAS, M. Aloshin, an alien, a native of Russia, who arrived at the Port of Seattle, Washington, on the 19th day of December, 1913, has been held by the Immigration Board for deportation, and
WHEREAS, the Immigration Board ordered the said alien to be deported, and
WHEREAS, the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division, discharged the said alien on a WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS, and

WHEREAS, the Court Ordered the said alien enlarged upon recognizance, with surety, for appearance to answer judgment of the Appelate Court,
NOW, THEREFORE, the condition of this obligation is such that if the above named principal, M. Aloshin, appears to answer and carry out the judgment of the United States Circuit Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit of the Appellate Court, then this obligation to be void, otherwise to reamin in full force and effect.
Signed and Sealed in the Presence of -
J Kalen
H Shafein
J Kalen
H Shafein
Aleshin
Mike Rubenstein
Ida Rubenstein
DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE office of UNITED STATES DISTRICT ATTORNEY March 30th, 1914.
Examened and apprived as to form and execution
P Fishbourne Assistant United Stated Attorney
Jeremiah Neterer United States District Judge.
